revised_title: Human Factors in Aviation: Addressing Errors on the Flight Deck
tldr: This article discusses the human factors that contribute to errors on the flight deck, despite advancements in aviation safety. It highlights the importance of proceduralization and pilot competency, but also addresses the remaining unaddressed human factors that continue to cause accidents. The author emphasizes the need for psychologists to evaluate risks and help find a balance between safety and cost in aircraft design and operation.
